import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update team"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/teams/{teamId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing team's name or description. Use this to keep team metadata in sync with HR or organizational changes.

**Prerequisites**
1. **teamId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/teams](/docs/api/teams/list-teams) or [GET /api/v1.0/teams/all](/docs/api/teams/list-all-teams) to list teams and extract `Items[].TeamId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Fetch team details: [GET /api/v1.0/teams/\{teamId\}](/docs/api/teams/get-team).
2. Update `TeamName` or `Description` in the request body.
3. [POST /api/v1.0/teams/\{teamId\}](/docs/api/teams/update-team) to save the changes.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `teamId` (path), `TeamName`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"teamId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for creating or updating a team.","properties":{"TeamName":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the team.","minLength":1},"Description":{"type":"string","description":"Description of the team.","nullable":true},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the team is soft-deleted.","default":false}},"required":["TeamName"],"title":"TeamRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
